snippet: Officials at the prison also erred by covering the inmate’s groin, where the injection was made, preventing them from seeing the problem.
abstract: Official report ordered by Oklahoma Gov Mary Fallin says state's execution of Clayton D Lockett was botched due to improperly placed intravenous line, which caused drugs to enter surrounding tissue rather than flow directly into his bloodstream; execution drew global attention to death penalty procedures and problems associated with lethal injections.
lead_paragraph: Officials at the prison also erred by covering the inmate’s groin, where the injection was made, preventing them from seeing the problem.

headline.main: IV Misplaced in Oklahoma Execution, Report Says
headline.print_headline: IV Misplaced in Oklahoma Execution, Report Says
